entries.title: Kyle Williams' Super 25 high school girls basketball rankings for Feb. 15, 2026
entries.summary: <p>Kenwood is peaking at the right time.</p><p>Coach Andre Lewis said that his team played its best defense in the city championship on Friday against Butler. The Broncos hounded Butler and made every shot difficult for the Lynx.</p><p>"One thing that always travels well is good defense," he said.</p><p>If the Broncos bring that defensive tenacity into the state playoffs, the Broncos will be a formidable team going forward. You can project what seniors Danielle Brooks (16.3 points per game) and Darreyelle Smith (9.6 points and 7.7 rebounds) are going to bring. offensively. But it was the Broncos' supporting cast that was impressive on Friday.</p><p>Freshman Janiah Daniel was impressive in her ability to attack the glass. She did a solid job of catching passes around the rim, and if she continues to improve as a finisher, she'll give the Broncos another offensive threat.</p><p>The defending state champions open the IHSA Class 4A state playoffs against Lindblom on Monday, and if Kenwood wins, it would face Hinsdale Central on Thursday for the regional championship. The true showdown would come in a potential sectional semifinal matchup against Downers Grove North.</p><h3><b>IHSA State playoffs</b></h3><h3><b>IHSA State playoffs</b></h3><p>The Hinsdale Central sectional is stacked with competition. The top-six seeds are Nazareth, Downers Grove North, Kenwood, Lyons, St. Ignatius and Young. It's a loaded field that could set up some intriguing matchups as the playoffs progress.</p><p>If both Lyons and St. Ignatius each win their semifinal games, it'll set up a regional finals matchup between the two teams. The Wolfpack are battle-tested after making it to the Class 3A state championship last season. Senior guard Gabby Hinton is a stabilizing force, and junior forward Kaylee Clarke is averaging eight points and 10 rebounds.</p><p>Lyons has dealt with injuries, most notably to senior forward Emma O'Brien, which is a big loss for the Lions because of O'Brien's ability to score in a multitude of ways while anchoring the defense. Without her, the Lions still have enough to advance in the playoffs with senior forward Gwen Smith and freshman guard Kennedy Moore.</p><p>If Nazareth beats Riverside-Brookfield on Tuesday, then it will have one of the toughest regional finals matchups if Young beats Reavis. Young has been a roller-coaster this season, but they were able to finish the CPS portion of its season emphatically with a 51-36 win over Lane.</p><p>Young has a two-headed duo at guard with sophomores Harmony Cooper and Yanni Smith. Sophomore forward Jordyn Ellis is an athletic forward who can make a considerable impact with her length whenever she’s on the floor. Junior forward Neelah Leech is also an important connector on both ends of the floor.</p><p>A potential Young-Nazareth matchup would be very intriguing. Nazareth is one of the best teams in the area, but has had moments of offensive stagnation. But the Roadrunners are an experienced group led by BYU commit Stella Sakalas, one of the area's best players. She is a dynamic talent who has demonstrated that she can be a force in the playoffs.</p><p><b>The Super 25, with record and last week’s ranking:</b></p><p><b>1. Nazareth (28-3) 1</b></p><p>No. 1 seed in Hinsdale Central sectional</p><p><b>2. Loyola Academy (28-2) 2</b></p><p>No. 1 seed in Park Ridge sectional</p><p><b>3. Kenwood (24-6) 5</b></p><p>Won CPS city championship</p><p><b>4. Waubonsie Valley (28-3) 3</b></p><p>No. 2 seed in Aurora sectional</p><p><b>5. Benet (24-4) 4</b></p><p>Plays Plainfield East Tuesday</p><p><b>6. Mother McAuley (22-6) 6</b></p><p>No. 1 seed in its sectional</p><p><b>7. Downers Grove North (27-2) 7</b></p><p>Plays Jones Tuesday</p><p><b>8. Naperville Central (24-6) 8</b></p><p>Plays Matea Valley Tuesday</p><p><b>9. Fremd (23-6) 9</b></p><p>Plays Palatine Tuesday</p><p><b>10. Providence (27-4) 10</b></p><p>No. 1 seed in Country Club Hills sectional</p><p><b>11. Carmel (21-9) 11</b></p><p>Plays Round Lake Monday</p><p><b>12. Marist (23-8) 12</b></p><p>Plays Richards Tuesday</p><p><b>13. Libertyville (24-6) 13</b></p><p>Plays Zion-Benton Tuesday</p><p><b>14. DePaul Prep (21-6) 14</b></p><p>Plays Oak Park-River Forest Tuesday</p><p><b>15. Maine South (22-8) 15</b></p><p>Plays Lincoln Park Tuesday</p><p><b>16. Glenbard West (25-4) 16</b></p><p>Plays Bartlett Tuesday</p><p><b>17. Glenbrook South (22-9) 17</b></p><p>Plays Niles West Tuesday</p><p><b>18. St. Charles East (18-11) 25</b></p><p>Plays West Chicago Monday</p><p><b>25. Young (15-12) NR</b></p><p>Third place in CPS playoffs.<br></p>
entries.author: Kyle Williams

entries.title: Spring-like weather forecast for Chicago area over the next several days
entries.summary: <p>Chicagoans could see record-breaking temperatures this week as they continue to enjoy an unseasonably warm February.</p><p>The National Weather Service forecasts the high will be 62 degrees Monday, and Wednesday is expected to be even warmer, with a high of 65. Tuesday's high will be 48 degrees, and temperatures are expected to drop toward the end of the week with highs in the 30s and 40s, with a possibility of rain Tuesday and Thursday.</p><p>Mid-February average temperatures usually hover around the 30s with potential to dip to frigid temperatures.</p><p>A record could be set Monday if the temperature at O'Hare Airport surpasses 58 degrees, the warmest temperature recorded for Feb. 16, set more than a century ago in 1921. Temperatures the rest of the week are expected to be unseasonably warm, but the area probably won't break records later in the week. A warm stretch in 2017 set several records with temperatures in the 70s.</p><p>The week is expected to be relatively sunny with some intermittent clouds and mild temperatures.</p><p>"These things go through cycles and phases. Currently, it looks like we're going to be fairly mild for a good chunk of the week," said NWS meteorologist Mark Ratzer. "Next weekend will be not bitterly cold, but we will cool down from what we're experiencing right now."</p><p>Possible thunderstorms could roll through the area Tuesday night, and a chance of rain is in the forecast for Thursday.</p><p>"We'll probably see some potential for some rain showers, but at least we're talking rain and not snow for this time of year," Ratzer said.</p><div class="RelatedList Enhancement" data-module data-align-center> <div class="RelatedList-title">Related</div> <ul class="RelatedList-items"> <li class="RelatedList-items-item"> <a class="Link" href="https://chicago.suntimes.com/2026/02/06/man-62-is-the-10th-cold-related-death-this-winter-in-cook-county" >Man, 62, is the 10th cold-related death this winter in Cook County</a> </li> <li class="RelatedList-items-item"> <a class="Link" href="https://chicago.suntimes.com/weather/2026/01/22/coldest-chicago-wind-chills-cold-snap" >Coldest wind chills since 2022 expected as Arctic cold snap moves into Chicago area</a> </li> </ul> </div> <p>The warmer weather has been welcome to many Chicagoans after January brought bitter temperatures and a decent amount of snow to the area. Across Cook County, 10 people have died of cold exposure so far this year.<br></p>
entries.author: Sun-Times Wire

entries.title: Michigan the new No. 1, Northwestern hitting a new low and old friend Porter Moser is up against at Oklahoma
entries.summary: <p>"Three Points" to keep in mind with three weeks to go in <a class="Link" href="https://chicago.suntimes.com/college-sports" target="_blank" >college basketball</a>’s regular season:</p><p><b>1. It’s Michigan, man</b></p><p>With Arizona having lost two in a row — not to mention hotshot freshman Koa Peat to an unspecified injury — Michigan will be the no-doubt-about-it new No. 1-ranked team on Monday.</p><p>Some of us already thought the Wolverines (24-1) were the best team, just saying. They’ve won 10 straight. They trailed by 16 in the second half at Northwestern last week, yet still won by a dozen. They came back Saturday and blew out UCLA by 30. When this team — off to the best start in school history — puts the pedal down, it’s flippin’ scary.</p><p>Oh, and guess who plays at Purdue on Tuesday?</p><div class="RelatedList Enhancement" data-module data-align-center> <div class="RelatedList-title">Related</div> <ul class="RelatedList-items"> <li class="RelatedList-items-item"> <a class="Link" href="https://chicago.suntimes.com/college-sports/2026/02/15/illinois-keaton-wagler-david-mrkovic-kasparas-jakucionis-will-riley-terrance-shannon-illini-march-madness" >Illini freshmen (better than last year?), NCAA potential (better than 2024?) shine through in rout of Indiana</a> </li> <li class="RelatedList-items-item"> <a class="Link" href="https://chicago.suntimes.com/college-sports/2026/02/10/college-basketball-illinois-michigan-arizona-duke-cameron-boozer-keaton-wagler" target="_blank" >Entering college basketball’s stretch run, here are 10 things to get you all caught up</a> </li> </ul> </div> <p><b>2. Purple pain</b></p><p>Northwestern, loser of five straight, is tied with Penn State at the bottom of the Big Ten at 2-13. Going by conference record, it’s the worst team 13th-year coach Chris Collins has had and the worst Wildcats team since the 2007-08 squad went 1-17.</p><p>The Wildcats did beat Penn State in late January, giving them the tiebreaker just in case.</p><p>So they’ve got that going for them, which is, you know, whatever.</p><p><b>3. Sooner or later</b></p><p>Oklahoma is on a two-game winning streak. Other than that, coach Porter Moser’s experience this season has been like an out-of-control Sooner Schooner. Did you know that losing eight straight SEC games isn’t ideal? Now Moser, the former Loyola hero, knows it, too.</p><p>But wait — it’s his fifth straight sub-.500 SEC season since leaving Rogers Park for the big-time. Things just aren’t working. His seat is hot. There are fans shouting for his dismissal. Any chance football can start half a year early? That might be the only thing that would save him. That, or an out-of-nowhere SEC tournament title run. Pray for the man.</p><div class="Enhancement" data-align-center><div class="Enhancement-item"> <div class="ExternalContent-wrapper" > <div class="TweetUrl"> <blockquote class="twitter-tweet"><p lang="en" dir="ltr">Taking the phrase “Porter Moser is on the hot seat” quite literally <a href="https://t.co/JJskGfG54L">https://t.co/JJskGfG54L</a></p>— College Basketball Collective (@CBBCollective) <a href="https://twitter.com/CBBCollective/status/2022789806632112243?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">February 14, 2026</a></blockquote> <script async src="https://platform.twitter.com/widgets.js" charset="utf-8"></script> </div> </div> </div></div><p></p>
entries.author: Steve Greenberg

entries.title: Horoscope for Monday, February 16, 2026
entries.summary: <h2>Moon Alert</h2> <p>There are no restrictions to shopping or important decisions today. The moon is in Aquarius.</p><h2>Aries (March 21-April 19)</h2> <p></p> <div class="Enhancement" data-align-center> <div class="HtmlModule"><a class="AnchorLink" id="html-embed-module-4d0000" name="html-embed-module-4d0000"></a><div class="HoroscopeStarbox HoroscopeStarbox_five"> <div class="HoroscopeStarbox_container"> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> </div> <div class="HoroscopeStarbox_description"> <p>An <b>average</b> day</p> </div> </div> <style> .HoroscopeStarbox { background: #f8f8f8; display: flex; align-items: center; } .HoroscopeStarbox_container { display: grid; grid-gap: 5px; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr; padding: 20px; width: 40%; min-width: 160px; max-width: 200px; } .HoroscopeStarbox_description { padding: 20px; font-family: var(--font-1); font-size: var(--body-2); } .HoroscopeStarbox_container svg { object-fit: cover; aspect-ratio: 1 / 1; width: 100%; } </style> </div> </div><p> Today requires a bit of Aries finesse because an unexpected quarrel or a sudden dispute with a friend or a member of a group might arise. (Naturally, you will speak your mind as is your wont.) Fortunately, you also have the ability to smooth things over, especially with family members if needed. It's all good.</p><h2>Taurus (April 20-May 20)</h2> <p></p> <div class="Enhancement" data-align-center> <div class="HtmlModule"><a class="AnchorLink" id="html-embed-module-4d0000" name="html-embed-module-4d0000"></a><div class="HoroscopeStarbox HoroscopeStarbox_five"> <div class="HoroscopeStarbox_container"> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> </div> <div class="HoroscopeStarbox_description"> <p>An <b>average</b> day</p> </div> </div> <style> .HoroscopeStarbox { background: #f8f8f8; display: flex; align-items: center; } .HoroscopeStarbox_container { display: grid; grid-gap: 5px; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr; padding: 20px; width: 40%; min-width: 160px; max-width: 200px; } .HoroscopeStarbox_description { padding: 20px; font-family: var(--font-1); font-size: var(--body-2); } .HoroscopeStarbox_container svg { object-fit: cover; aspect-ratio: 1 / 1; width: 100%; } </style> </div> </div><p> Tread carefully around authority figures today — parents, bosses, VIPs and the police — because some kind of outburst or argument might occur. Admittedly, you're pumped with energy and ambition. Someone younger, perhaps a friend or a member of a group, might restore the peace.</p><h2>Gemini (May 21-June 20)</h2> <p></p> <div class="Enhancement" data-align-center> <div class="HtmlModule"><a class="AnchorLink" id="html-embed-module-7b0000" name="html-embed-module-7b0000"></a><div class="HoroscopeStarbox HoroscopeStarbox_five"> <div class="HoroscopeStarbox_container"> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> </div> <div class="HoroscopeStarbox_description"> <p>A <b>positive</b> day</p> </div> </div> <style> .HoroscopeStarbox { background: #f8f8f8; display: flex; align-items: center; } .HoroscopeStarbox_container { display: grid; grid-gap: 5px; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr; padding: 20px; width: 40%; min-width: 160px; max-width: 200px; } .HoroscopeStarbox_description { padding: 20px; font-family: var(--font-1); font-size: var(--body-2); } .HoroscopeStarbox_container svg { object-fit: cover; aspect-ratio: 1 / 1; width: 100%; } </style> </div> </div><p> Pay attention to everything you say and do because this is an accident-prone day for you. Travel plans might suddenly change. Quarrels about politics, religion and racial issues might erupt. People are sensitive today. However, a discussion with a boss or a parent will be encouraging. (This will help.)</p><h2>Cancer (June 21-July 22)</h2> <p></p> <div class="Enhancement" data-align-center> <div class="HtmlModule"><a class="AnchorLink" id="html-embed-module-7b0000" name="html-embed-module-7b0000"></a><div class="HoroscopeStarbox HoroscopeStarbox_five"> <div class="HoroscopeStarbox_container"> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> </div> <div class="HoroscopeStarbox_description"> <p>A <b>positive</b> day</p> </div> </div> <style> .HoroscopeStarbox { background: #f8f8f8; display: flex; align-items: center; } .HoroscopeStarbox_container { display: grid; grid-gap: 5px; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr; padding: 20px; width: 40%; min-width: 160px; max-width: 200px; } .HoroscopeStarbox_description { padding: 20px; font-family: var(--font-1); font-size: var(--body-2); } .HoroscopeStarbox_container svg { object-fit: cover; aspect-ratio: 1 / 1; width: 100%; } </style> </div> </div><p> Two different influences are at play today. One influence might encourage arguments and flare-ups about shared property, taxes, debt or inheritances. (Not good.) However, the other influence, by contrast, will promote agreement and the fun exploration of lofty ideas and travel plans. Tallyho! Take your pick.</p><h2>Leo (July 23-Aug. 22)</h2> <p></p> <div class="Enhancement" data-align-center> <div class="HtmlModule"><a class="AnchorLink" id="html-embed-module-4d0000" name="html-embed-module-4d0000"></a><div class="HoroscopeStarbox HoroscopeStarbox_five"> <div class="HoroscopeStarbox_container"> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> </div> <div class="HoroscopeStarbox_description"> <p>An <b>average</b> day</p> </div> </div> <style> .HoroscopeStarbox { background: #f8f8f8; display: flex; align-items: center; } .HoroscopeStarbox_container { display: grid; grid-gap: 5px; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr; padding: 20px; width: 40%; min-width: 160px; max-width: 200px; } .HoroscopeStarbox_description { padding: 20px; font-family: var(--font-1); font-size: var(--body-2); } .HoroscopeStarbox_container svg { object-fit: cover; aspect-ratio: 1 / 1; width: 100%; } </style> </div> </div><p> Be patient with partners, spouses and close friends today because sudden comments or unexpected behavior might be upsetting. (You won't be happy.) However, on the upside, good news about money, investments and shared property will bring a smile to your face. Ka-ching! All is well.</p><h2>Virgo (Aug. 23-Sept. 22)</h2> <p></p> <div class="Enhancement" data-align-center> <div class="HtmlModule"><a class="AnchorLink" id="html-embed-module-7b0000" name="html-embed-module-7b0000"></a><div class="HoroscopeStarbox HoroscopeStarbox_five"> <div class="HoroscopeStarbox_container"> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> </div> <div class="HoroscopeStarbox_description"> <p>A <b>positive</b> day</p> </div> </div> <style> .HoroscopeStarbox { background: #f8f8f8; display: flex; align-items: center; } .HoroscopeStarbox_container { display: grid; grid-gap: 5px; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr; padding: 20px; width: 40%; min-width: 160px; max-width: 200px; } .HoroscopeStarbox_description { padding: 20px; font-family: var(--font-1); font-size: var(--body-2); } .HoroscopeStarbox_container svg { object-fit: cover; aspect-ratio: 1 / 1; width: 100%; } </style> </div> </div><p> Be patient with work colleagues today, as well as care workers and issues related to your pet, because arguments and sudden disruptions are likely. Fortunately, conversations with those who are close to you, like spouses, partners and dear friends, are upbeat and rewarding.</p><h2>Libra (Sept. 23-Oct. 22)</h2> <p></p> <div class="Enhancement" data-align-center> <div class="HtmlModule"><a class="AnchorLink" id="html-embed-module-7b0000" name="html-embed-module-7b0000"></a><div class="HoroscopeStarbox HoroscopeStarbox_five"> <div class="HoroscopeStarbox_container"> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> </div> <div class="HoroscopeStarbox_description"> <p>A <b>positive</b> day</p> </div> </div> <style> .HoroscopeStarbox { background: #f8f8f8; display: flex; align-items: center; } .HoroscopeStarbox_container { display: grid; grid-gap: 5px; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr; padding: 20px; width: 40%; min-width: 160px; max-width: 200px; } .HoroscopeStarbox_description { padding: 20px; font-family: var(--font-1); font-size: var(--body-2); } .HoroscopeStarbox_container svg { object-fit: cover; aspect-ratio: 1 / 1; width: 100%; } </style> </div> </div><p> Please note: This is an accident-prone day for your kids, which serves as a warning for parents. It's also an accident-prone day for sports events. Social occasions might suddenly change. However, be confident that work-related conversations, especially those involving travel, will go well.</p><h2>Scorpio (Oct. 23-Nov. 21)</h2> <p></p> <div class="Enhancement" data-align-center> <div class="HtmlModule"><a class="AnchorLink" id="html-embed-module-4d0000" name="html-embed-module-4d0000"></a><div class="HoroscopeStarbox HoroscopeStarbox_five"> <div class="HoroscopeStarbox_container"> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> </div> <div class="HoroscopeStarbox_description"> <p>An <b>average</b> day</p> </div> </div> <style> .HoroscopeStarbox { background: #f8f8f8; display: flex; align-items: center; } .HoroscopeStarbox_container { display: grid; grid-gap: 5px; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr; padding: 20px; width: 40%; min-width: 160px; max-width: 200px; } .HoroscopeStarbox_description { padding: 20px; font-family: var(--font-1); font-size: var(--body-2); } .HoroscopeStarbox_container svg { object-fit: cover; aspect-ratio: 1 / 1; width: 100%; } </style> </div> </div><p> Family arguments or something else that might disrupt your home routine — perhaps appliance breakdowns or a minor breakage — might change your day. Be patient with family members to avoid arguments. Fortunately, social outings, sports events, the arts and fun activities with kids are blessed. Yay!</p><h2>Sagittarius (Nov. 22-Dec. 21)</h2> <p></p> <div class="Enhancement" data-align-center> <div class="HtmlModule"><a class="AnchorLink" id="html-embed-module-4d0000" name="html-embed-module-4d0000"></a><div class="HoroscopeStarbox HoroscopeStarbox_five"> <div class="HoroscopeStarbox_container"> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> </div> <div class="HoroscopeStarbox_description"> <p>An <b>average</b> day</p> </div> </div> <style> .HoroscopeStarbox { background: #f8f8f8; display: flex; align-items: center; } .HoroscopeStarbox_container { display: grid; grid-gap: 5px; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr; padding: 20px; width: 40%; min-width: 160px; max-width: 200px; } .HoroscopeStarbox_description { padding: 20px; font-family: var(--font-1); font-size: var(--body-2); } .HoroscopeStarbox_container svg { object-fit: cover; aspect-ratio: 1 / 1; width: 100%; } </style> </div> </div><p> This is a restless day. Pay attention to everything you say and do today because this is an accident-prone day for your sign. Be aware and mindful. Sudden arguments might occur. You might also have a sudden separation. Home and family are supportive.</p><h2>Capricorn (Dec. 22-Jan. 19)</h2> <p></p> <div class="Enhancement" data-align-center> <div class="HtmlModule"><a class="AnchorLink" id="html-embed-module-4d0000" name="html-embed-module-4d0000"></a><div class="HoroscopeStarbox HoroscopeStarbox_five"> <div class="HoroscopeStarbox_container"> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> </div> <div class="HoroscopeStarbox_description"> <p>An <b>average</b> day</p> </div> </div> <style> .HoroscopeStarbox { background: #f8f8f8; display: flex; align-items: center; } .HoroscopeStarbox_container { display: grid; grid-gap: 5px; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr; padding: 20px; width: 40%; min-width: 160px; max-width: 200px; } .HoroscopeStarbox_description { padding: 20px; font-family: var(--font-1); font-size: var(--body-2); } .HoroscopeStarbox_container svg { object-fit: cover; aspect-ratio: 1 / 1; width: 100%; } </style> </div> </div><p> Keep an eye on your money and your assets today because something unexpected could impact them. Protect what you own against loss, theft or damage. Meanwhile, short trips and conversations with siblings, relatives and neighbors are upbeat and fun.</p><h2>Aquarius (Jan. 20-Feb. 18)</h2> <p></p> <div class="Enhancement" data-align-center> <div class="HtmlModule"><a class="AnchorLink" id="html-embed-module-7b0000" name="html-embed-module-7b0000"></a><div class="HoroscopeStarbox HoroscopeStarbox_five"> <div class="HoroscopeStarbox_container"> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> </div> <div class="HoroscopeStarbox_description"> <p>A <b>positive</b> day</p> </div> </div> <style> .HoroscopeStarbox { background: #f8f8f8; display: flex; align-items: center; } .HoroscopeStarbox_container { display: grid; grid-gap: 5px; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr; padding: 20px; width: 40%; min-width: 160px; max-width: 200px; } .HoroscopeStarbox_description { padding: 20px; font-family: var(--font-1); font-size: var(--body-2); } .HoroscopeStarbox_container svg { object-fit: cover; aspect-ratio: 1 / 1; width: 100%; } </style> </div> </div><p> All kinds of unexpected things might occur today — among them, you might be suddenly separated from someone or an argument might occur. It's an accident-prone day. Be careful! On the upside, financial negotiations will go well. Looking good!</p><h2>Pisces (Feb. 19-March 20)</h2> <p></p> <div class="Enhancement" data-align-center> <div class="HtmlModule"><a class="AnchorLink" id="html-embed-module-7b0000" name="html-embed-module-7b0000"></a><div class="HoroscopeStarbox HoroscopeStarbox_five"> <div class="HoroscopeStarbox_container"> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> <svg class="HoroscopeStar"><use xlink:href="#icon-star"></use></svg> </div> <div class="HoroscopeStarbox_description"> <p>A <b>positive</b> day</p> </div> </div> <style> .HoroscopeStarbox { background: #f8f8f8; display: flex; align-items: center; } .HoroscopeStarbox_container { display: grid; grid-gap: 5px; grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr 1fr; padding: 20px; width: 40%; min-width: 160px; max-width: 200px; } .HoroscopeStarbox_description { padding: 20px; font-family: var(--font-1); font-size: var(--body-2); } .HoroscopeStarbox_container svg { object-fit: cover; aspect-ratio: 1 / 1; width: 100%; } </style> </div> </div><p> You can be persuasive today, especially when talking to your kids or in any area related to the arts, sports and social outings. People will listen to you. Privately, however, something going on behind the scenes could promote accident-prone behavior. Be careful. Don't take anything for granted and keep your wits about you.</p><h2>If today is your birthday</h2><p>Actor Mahershala Ali (1974) shares your birthday today. Justice and fair play are important to you. You are insightful, analytical, compassionate and intuitive. This is a year of new beginnings and adventures. Keep your eyes open for new opportunities and be ready to act. What you do now will bring great benefits in the future. Prepare for leadership. </p>
